Banner.Description: I have 3+ years of experience developing web pages and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I focus on writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and JavaScript, applying good practices and development standards. I am passionate about technology and enjoy leading teams. I am excited to work on new and innovative projects and am dedicated to continuous learning. Outside of work, I love to travel and explore different cultures.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: As a Technology Analyst at Infosys, I am currently working on updating a financial institution's GWT legacy application to Angular.
I am skilled in Angular, TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SASS, Reactive Forms, MongoDB, ExpressJS, Firebase, SQL, Karma, Jasmine, Git, and Java.
My capabilities also include implementing dynamic web pages, optimizing sites, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.

I have a Bachelor of Technology degree in Computer Science Engineering from University Institute of Engineering and Technology, Kurukshetra University, earned in 2021. During my studies, I organized and participated in various technical events and workshops.
I also program things for my personal use, whether as a hobby or for utility.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Technology Analyst | Fullstack developer
Description: Migrating legacy application to Angular, handling Java for reverse engineering.
Used Ngx Formly to boost HTML code reuse by 95%.
Created flexible shared services for data binding.
Migrating Oracle forms to MongoDB using Spring for Angular.
Gained banking domain knowledge and large team experience.
Wrote dynamic code adaptable to new requirements

Experience.Jobs.Title: Independent
Description: Implementing continuous improvements, working on frontend and backend.
Creating Web pages with Angular, HTML, CSS, ExpressJS, Firebase programmed with functional, reactive, and object-oriented programming paradigms.
Design layout with SASS, Bootstrap, Materialize, PrimeNg, etc.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Tasks-Todo
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Crafted an innovative Todo Task Board website using Angular 16, HTML, and CSS on the frontend, while ensuring robust functionality with Express and MongoDB on the backend. Secured user access through Firebase authentication

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: SRM Gym
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A freelancing project developed in Angular in which Gym Owner can handle all his client. It has tabular view of all clients with add / edit user feature.

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Pokemon
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Pokemon search engine that uses the pokeapi. Object-oriented programming was used to organize the information of the pokemons along with their respective image.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Coming soon page
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a two-column split page to be used as a 'Coming soon page'. Scheduled to be a fully responsive design. It has a form field to subscribe by email.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Four card feature section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A single page that has a minimal design, listing four features on four cards. Input animations are done with angular animations.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Social proof section
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Personal project of a page designed from a Figma layout. Angular was used for development together with SASS and CSS GRID.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: FAQ accordion card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: FAQ accordion with logic and animations made in Angular.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Profile card
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Feel free to reach out for collaboration or freelance opportunities.
